latestVersion.termsOfUse:
Licensing restrictions Licensed electronic resources are restricted to members of the Harvard community and to on-site users of Harvard's libraries for purposes of research, teaching, and private study. Under Harvard's licenses for electronic resources, users generally may not:

  • use the licensed materials for commercial purposes, including but not limited to the sale of the licensed materials
Users are individually responsible for compliance with these terms.
latestVersion.depositorRequirements:
a) Research Licensee and Authorized Users may make all use of the data as is consistent with the Fair Use Provisions of United States and international law. Nothing in this Agreement shall be interpreted to limit in any way whatsoever Research Licensee's or any Authorized User's rights under the Fair Use provisions of United States or international law to use the data.
b) Authorized Users must provide GlobeScan with an electronic copy of all material derived from the data and intended for publication (reports, tables, etc.) for approval by GlobeScan prior to publication. 
 c) Authorized Users may not re-sell the data, nor make commercial use of reports or other material derived from the data.
 d) Authorized Users must provide GlobeScan with an electronic copy of all final reports derived from the data. 
 e)Authorized Users must make reference to GlobeScan In
corporated as source on all material derived from the data.
 g) Harvard-affiliated authors who submit scholarly content to GI shall have the right to retain copyrights to their work, to self-archive and/or deposit their works in institutional, subject-based, national, or other open repositories or archives (including the author's own web pages or departmental servers), and to use their work for other scholarly and educational purposes.
latestVersion.termsOfAccess:
This dataset is restricted to members of the Harvard community and to on-site users of Harvard's libraries for purposes of research, teaching, and private study.

Harvard affiliates may access the data by logging into this system via the Shibboleth Authentication option provided.

dsDescriptionValue.value: IMPORTANT NOTE - Please apply final weight (variable: weight_f) when running the analysis. The data are weighted based on gender within age and education on each country.
